sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Adds a ServiceNow Flow Designer Action that cleans CSV file attachments by removing a specified number of header lines. The script fetches the target attachment, skips the requested number of lines, and outputs the cleaned CSV content. Optionally, it
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Adds a ServiceNow Flow Designer Action that cleans CSV file attachments by removing a specified number of header lines. The script fetches the target attachment, skips the requested number of lines, and outputs the cleaned CSV content. Optionally, it can write back the cleaned data as a new attachment. Handles missing content and errors gracefully.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Strip top lines from csv file

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.annotation: Adds a ServiceNow Flow Designer Action that cleans CSV file attachments by removing a specified number of header lines. The script fetches the target attachment, skips the requested number of lines, and outputs the cleaned CSV content. Optionally, it
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description: Adds a ServiceNow Flow Designer Action that cleans CSV file attachments by removing a specified number of header lines. The script fetches the target attachment, skips the requested number of lines, and outputs the cleaned CSV content. Optionally, it can write back the cleaned data as a new attachment. Handles missing content and errors gracefully.
